articles.author: Swati Gupta
articles.title: India Parliament Passes Controversial Muslim Property Law - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The Indian Parliament passed amendments to a controversial decades-old law governing Muslim-owned properties donated for religious and charitable purposes, after lengthy debates in both houses.
articles.content:
